website_summaries.verdict: One of the newest canister vacs by Hoover that can be used indoors or outdoors, and for cleaning wet or dry messes. The most versatile available by the brand.
pros: Impressive suction power that can deliver up to 65 CFM
Can be used to pick up dirt and debris in a garage, workshop, or outdoors
also works well for cleaning tasks inside the home
cons: Cordless, but the battery life could be better
Suction tube is fairly short, which makes it awkward to use for some cleanup tasks

website_summaries.verdict: If you need a vacuum that can do more than clean carpets, this wet or dry canister model is the one for you.
pros: A canister model that doubles as a utility vac, as it can be used indoors and outdoors as well as on wet and dry surfaces
Large, rugged tires keep the machine from tipping
cons: While we love that this versatile canister vac is cordless, we wish the battery held a charge longer
The suction tube is fairly short

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE this
customer_reviews.text: Works great for people with lots of pets. It picks up the big stuff and you don't have to worry about destroying your dyson. The battery lasts for a surprising long time (I bought 2), and this vacuum is now one of my prized gadgets
customer_reviews.author: PipSqueek

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Vacuum. Crap battery.
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum. Hate the battery. What else is there to say.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Good vac wish it had longer lasting battery and quicker charger over all good
customer_reviews.text: Good job wish the battery was a bit longer lasting and it had one of the best quality turbo battery charger lol but I wouldn’t change much bout it beside battery life. Good Vac
customer_reviews.author: Keith Richard

customer_reviews.title: Wet Dry Vac
customer_reviews.text: I wish the battery lasted longer but it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Smelser

customer_reviews.title: Battery sucks
customer_reviews.text: This well designed Vac works ok for small jobs. I should have read the reviews. I need it to work on larger jobs and it doesn't. Very dissatisfied. Should I invest in another battery for $100 and still not have enough run time?
customer_reviews.author: Richard E. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time believing that this is actually a cordless battery powered shop vac. It certainly isn't lacking in suction! It works every bit as good as the corded shop vac that it's replacing. It also seems to weigh about half as much. Of course this wouldn't mean much of it didn't hold a charge for a reasonable amount of time. It does. I used it for about 20 minutes and when I was done it still had a charge. Also it doesn't lose suction as the battery discharges. It works perfectly until it is fully discharged. Hoover has always been a trusted name for vacuum cleaners and this one is no exception. Most highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Perfect for Small Jobs
customer_reviews.text: This probably is not the vacuum you will want if a flooded basement is your issue. It is lightweight and easy to move around, but does not hold a great deal. It is perfect for the home garage or mud room clean-up. Easy to maneuver, great suctions and no troublesome cord. And, it is cute. It has clever little elastic bands to hold the accessories in place, and stored away, it looks like R2-D2 standing by in the closet ready to lend a hand at vacuuming up water or workshop debris. The filter is easily removed. the pieces go together neatly and It is a great little wet vac for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for using on small jobs around the house or in the yard!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item to use around the house when cleaning the garage or getting rid of leaves that fall into the driveway. The storage is great and the attachments work well in both wet or dry conditions. It is of a smaller size which is great when you do not have large jobs to do. The wheels work well and make it very convenient to haul to the spot where you want to work. We vacuumed the car and it was very easy to get into spaces which were small. Great item and one that will work well for the yard and patio, we highly recommended this from a company that has been cleaning up for years!
customer_reviews.author: Clark Isaacs

customer_reviews.title: Much easier to maneuver and use, especially with water which is heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Cordless, powered by rechargeable battery that is included. Extended hose, rinseable filter. Small enough to lift when wet and does not tip like others do. Useful to clean cars or AC pans in attic sheet systems. Dirt tank holds 6 gallons of dry materials.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Manygoats

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shop vac
customer_reviews.text: Cordless rocks! I ended up using this shop vac when replacing a good 20 yards of drain covers and the drains were all filled up with dirt, leaves and pine needles. I filled up the vac twice on a single charge. I didn't time it, but I was going at it for a long time. I like the removable battery, and suction is great. A fantastic shop vac, with just as much power as a corded vac, and the battery gives you so much freedom! Love it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: esanta

customer_reviews.title: My garage is clean!!
customer_reviews.text: This shop vacuum is great! I had a huge project of vacuuming and cleaning my garage. It was covered in spider webs and misc trash that a regular vacuum could not clean. Great weight to and easy to maneuver. It also was great for cleaning my car. I recommend this vacuum for anyone looking to pick up medium sized trash around hard to reach areas!
customer_reviews.author: Gisell Langelier

customer_reviews.title: My GoTo Vacuum For Odd Jobs
customer_reviews.text: I have a cordless Dyson I love, so was excited to see a cordless shop vac. The Hoover is very maneuverable, and nicely built. The suction is better than I expected, and great for the odd jobs where there is not good access to electricity that I primarily use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Lemon

customer_reviews.title: Ryobi tti
customer_reviews.text: Ryobi has same vac and better battery's made by the same company
customer_reviews.author: Faustino perez

customer_reviews.title: Freedom from Wire
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of 6-gallon vacuum but they all are corded. I am very happy to have this Hoover Utility ONEPWR 6 Gallon Cordless Vacuum because of it gives me the freedom from the electric cord. Now I can take it outdoor to clean my car in the parking lot. It's light to carry but sturdy. It also has convenient hoses and accessory storage areas. It's reasonably powerful. The battery arrived fully charged, so I could start using it immediately. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Mat633

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I work outside a lot and hate tripping over power cords. This is a great idea, however, it is not powerful enough for my needs. The suction power seems to be around 3HP as it is more than my 1.5HP vac but quite a bit less than my 5HP vac. The hose it too short, as is the case with most wet/dry vacs, but comes with several useful attachments. The run time seems to be around 20-30 minutes of near continuous use and the battery recharge time is quite fast. Overall, it is great for quick use where major suction is not needed.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, cord-free vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: To sum this up, it's a cordless shop vac with a modest battery life and slightly above modest suction at a decent price. I really do like this vacuum. It's lightweight(ish) and rolls easily. Suction, although not great, is ample and the integrated storage is ingenious. My biggest gripe is battery life. It's not very long. Probably only 30 minutes, long. And it takes a while to charge. It's well built and feels as if it'll last a while. Other than run time, I'm extremely happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Method2Madness

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life
customer_reviews.text: I really love this vacuum. I was skeptical that a battery-powered vacuum could be all that useful, but I was pleasantly surprised. After I charged the battery, I used this steady for a little over an hour before the battery died. I used it to vacuum out the leaves, debris, and water left in my pool after the drain. It worked so well. It maneuvered so easily. The wheels make make it really smooth. It is light and looks far nicer than any other shop vacs I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Cahleesto

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: While this vacuum doesn’t hold a ton, it works amazing!! Not as big and bulky as a shop vac and moves around easily. Nice suction and works great in my kid ridden SUV. Gets the small crumbs in my mats and between seats and works wonderfully for soda/juice spills in the back seat! Hooray for Hoover! This thing is a game changer and I highly recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

product_meta.title: Hoover ONEPWR 20V Ultility 6 Gallon Cordless Vacuum, Wet/Dry High Capacity Cleaner, Shop Vac, BH57125, White
product_meta.description: Style:6 Gallon Wet/DryThe HOOVER ONEPWR Cordless High-Capacity Utility Vacuum combines extra powerful suction (up to 65 CFM) with a convenient, easy to use, durable design. Regardless if you’re indoor or out, it’s XL capacity, No-Tip Wheel Design, and full set of multi-purpose tools allows you to clean larger messes while easily maneuvering around obstacles. With extra power and capacity you can tackle any wet or dry mess with confidence, while the easy-empty tank keeps clean ups mess-free.
feature_bullets: Extra power and capacity for wet/dry messes.
Powerful performance delivers up to 65 CFM.
Easy-empty tank with 6 gal/22L dry capacity.
Complete with on-board multi-purpose tool kit.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars45 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
